ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you heard of the sober curious or sober sometimes movement?
Notes: 1=No; 2=Yes, I have heard of it, but I am not sure what it is; 3=Yes, I have heard of it, and I know what it is; 4=Yes, I have tried it, attended an event, or participated in some way

ElementDescription: In the past year, have you participated in a Dry January, Sober October, or another defined period of time when the goal was to avoid drinking alcohol?
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - I wanted to detox, lose weight, or quickly change something about my health or body
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - I wanted to start/improve healthy habits in general
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - To decrease my tolerance
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - I felt that I was drinking too much or too often
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - I had a negative event occur because of my drinking (e.g., accident, injury, etc.)
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - For religious/spirituality reasons (e.g., gave it up for Lent)
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - Other people were doing it, or I did it as part of a team, pledge, fundraiser, etc.
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - Another reason
Why did you choose to participate in a period of time with a goal to avoid drinking alcohol? Check all that apply - Another reason (specify reason)
Did you finish the period of time or challenge without drinking alcohol?
Did you resume drinking alcohol after the period of time or challenge?
Notes: 1=No; 2=Yes, I drank less afterward; 3=Yes, I drank the same afterward; 4=Yes, I drank more afterward
